name: Solitaire Classic Gold
description:
Solitaire has been loved throughout the centuries, and there’s a good reason why. Perfect for a quiet moment, a lazy day or as a fun activity to pass the time, Solitaire is the gold standard for card games. Our classic version has stripped back any unnecessary clutter to give you the best game possible.

Based on the traditional Klondike style of solitaire, the rules are simple and easy to learn if you’ve never played before. Arrange the cards, alternating between red and black and disregarding suit, in descending order. Get out your aces and organise them into suits to complete the game. If you get stuck, flip the deck to search for more cards to help you out. There’s even a handy undo button just in case!

Not only can you zen-out to soothing sound effects and simple backgrounds, you can inject a bit of competitiveness by following your accumulative score as you play round after round. Collect points and beat your score with round completion bonuses and time bonuses where you can really test your skill!

Features:
• Tap or drag and drop to arrange cards
• Step by step tutorial
• Crisp and clearly designed cards
• Pick from 1 card and 3 card options. (Easy and Hard)
• Undo button to rectify mistakes
• Optional sound effects and atmospheric music
• Grow your score by winning multiple rounds
• Designed for iPhones and iPads.

When you surpass bronze and silver, you get Solitaire Classic Gold!
